properties.Replacement Value: Failed to execute test at URI: ${http.request.uri}

properties.sql-query:
copy test_nar_table_csv (id, name, description)
to stdout (format 'csv')

properties.sql-statement:
insert into test_nar_table_put (id, name, description) 
values (?, ?, ?)

properties.custom-query: select id, name, description from test_nar_table_csv order by id

select id, name, description 
from test_nar_table_csv 
where id in (select col::numeric from unnest(?) col)
order by id
properties.ids-custom-query: select id source_id from test_nar_table_csv where id in (1,2) order by id

properties.custom-query: select id, name, description from test_nar_table_csv order by id

properties.db-fetch-sql-query:
select id, name, description 
from test_nar_table_csv 
where id in (select col::numeric from unnest(?) col)
order by id

select id, name, description 
from test_nar_table_csv 
where id in (select col::numeric from unnest(?) col)
order by id
